articles.author: Daniel Boffey
articles.title: EU leaders announce intention to collectively rearm in face of Putin threat - The Guardian
articles.description: Versailles declaration says Russia’s war in Ukraine has heralded ‘tectonic shift in European history’
articles.content: EU leaders have announced their intention to collectively rearm and become autonomous in food, energy and military hardware in a Versailles declaration that described Russias war as a tectonic shift … [+4540 chars]

articles.author: David J. Lynch
articles.title: Biden, European allies move to strip Russia of trade status - The Washington Post
articles.description: The president calls the actions a “crushing blow" to the Russian economy, which already has been pummeled by financial sanctions.
articles.content: Biden called the actions another crushing blow to Russias economy, which has been pummeled by comprehensive financial sanctions announced in the aftermath of Moscows Feb. 24th invasion of its neighbo… [+4526 chars]
